attributes.action: let us be proud of great britan once again
attributes.additional_details:
Marks And Spencers
muslim working in a London M&S store was refusing to serve customers who were purchasing pork or alcohol.
They already tried to get Christmas changed to 'Winterfest'
and will not let us fly are england flag in public
Stop other cultures from changing how we represent things, such as changing the name of our holidays, stopping us waving our flags, serve us at shops without a fuss as what we buy is our choice and let us be able to show we are proud of our contry.
